messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Sandra's post, was perspective for Laura B.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/8/03 5:05:52 PM, KathrynJB@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/8/03 5:05:52 PM, KathrynJB@... writes:

<<
Heehee...I'm thinking we need a FAQ (or is there one? Whatever...) which has
these comments about Sandra in it. Then the next time someone comes on
complaining about the Evil Sandra and her Doddites, we can just say: Read the
FAQ!

Kathryn >>

Well not THAT, but I am collecting testimonials about this list and about the
unschooling.com forum just about for that purpose!
It will go on this page eventually:
http://sandradodd.com/help
which is linked through
http://sandradodd.com/life
where I'm plugging in best-of stories about typical days, and not spanking,
and (coming soon) letting kids eat or not eat, and... all that good stuff
that isn't directly unschooling itself.
<A HREF="http://sandradodd.com/life">Parenting Issues for Unschoolers</A>

<A HREF="http://sandradodd.com/help">Unschooling Assistance and Ideas</A>

I had worked up more on that second page the other day, but I junked it
because it was THE ugliest webpage I had ever seen, ever. TOTALLY pink and
purple and an embarrassment to color itself, so it's back to basically the
flattened earth and some orange construction cones.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: Sandra's post, was perspective for Laura B.
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra your writing is so powerful. I too am very impressed with your wisdom and insight. Please link it to your web site so I can return to it when need be.
messages.messageBody:
Sandra your writing is so powerful. I too am very impressed with your wisdom
and insight. Please link it to your web site so I can return to it when need
be. Thanks!

Kim



<<Sandra this is a wonderful and powerful piece of writing and I hope you

link it on your web site. >>

messages.msgSnippet: Here, here!  Wow!! Very powerful and thought-provoking.  I m still swallowing to try get rid of the lump in my throat. Pam L. [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
Here, here! Wow!!

Very powerful and thought-provoking. I'm still swallowing to try get rid of the lump in my throat.

Pam L.
